snippet: The Texas Board of Veterinary Medical Examiners suspended a veterinarian’s license on Thursday after he admitted telling some clients he would euthanize their pets but kept them in cages at his clinic.
lead_paragraph: The Texas Board of Veterinary Medical Examiners suspended a veterinarian’s license on Thursday after he admitted telling some clients he would euthanize their pets but kept them in cages at his clinic.

headline.main: Texas: Veterinarian Is Accused of Cruelty to Dying Animals
headline.print_headline: Texas: Veterinarian Is Accused of Cruelty To Dying Animals
